## MatrixConstuctor interface

Parameters for creating a Matrix. Used by [the Matrix constructor](./matrix-scan.matrix.md)<!-- -->. (beta)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MatrixConstuctor 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [direction?](./matrix-scan.matrixconstuctor.direction.md) | [VectorDirection](./matrix-scan.vectordirection.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The initial direction the vector travels from the start corner across the matrix . Default <code>VectorDirection.X</code> |
|  [height?](./matrix-scan.matrixconstuctor.height.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Height of the matrix. Default <code>0</code>. |
|  [pattern?](./matrix-scan.matrixconstuctor.pattern.md) | [VectorPattern](./matrix-scan.vectorpattern.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Matrix pattern. Default <code>VectorPattern.zigzag</code> |
|  [startCorner?](./matrix-scan.matrixconstuctor.startcorner.md) | [MatrixCorner](./matrix-scan.matrixcorner.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The corner of the matrix where the vector starts. Default <code>VectorStartCorner.BottomLeft</code> |
|  [width?](./matrix-scan.matrixconstuctor.width.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Width of the matrix. Default <code>0</code>. |
